definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook
(idiom) to gasp in amazement/to acclaim as the peak of perfection
Guwen Guanzhi, an anthology of essays written in Literary Chinese, compiled and edited by Wu Chucai and Wu Diaohou of Qing dynasty

sentences.english: In chapter two, the background of the Notes of Classical Chinese is demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 第二章論述了《古文觀止》成書的背景。

sentences.english: The fledglings were amazing to watch as they tried to fly for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 那些剛長羽毛的小鳥初次飛行的樣子令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: The colors are a result of volcanic activity. The beauty is breathtaking.
sentences.chinese: 這些色彩是火山活動的結果，其美麗令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: Doctor J's dunks were wondrous to the eye.
sentences.chinese: 博士的扣籃讓人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: Brocard angle is an admirable classic in mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 勃羅卡角是數學的一個經典，令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: The juggler was the amazement of the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 變戲法者使市民們歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: It was just a spectacular place.
sentences.chinese: 這是個寧人歎爲觀止的地方。

sentences.english: The group of explorer were stunned by the view from the summit.
sentences.chinese: 探險隊員們對山頂的景色歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: Face reading Qu really sighs for the view to this young.
sentences.chinese: 面相覷，對這位少年真是歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: This shows of noodles in datong charm really amazing.
sentences.chinese: 由此可見刀削麪在大同的魅力真的令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: The stunning landscape in which Guilin is situated has a kind of magic that is all its own.
sentences.chinese: 桂林景觀令人歎爲觀止，擁有一種自成一體的魅力。

sentences.english: The quickness and agility of a good shortstop can certainly be awe-inspiring.
sentences.chinese: 傑出游擊手的迅速和靈活絕對令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: Women have strengths that amaze men.
sentences.chinese: 女人具有男人所歎爲觀止的力量。

sentences.english: Watch breathtaking movies and mind-bending TV shows.
sentences.chinese: 看看那些歎爲觀止的電影和引你深思的電視節目。

sentences.english: It’s the price we pay for all that amazing human intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們要爲歎爲觀止的人類智力所付出的代價。

sentences.english: The tourists will be marveled at a dazzling exhibition of their stone inscriptions in the resort.
sentences.chinese: 他們留下的石刻碑文，令遊客目不暇接，歎爲觀止。

definition: (last line of the poem 望岳 by Tang poet Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]) with one look I shall see all the smaller mountains down below (from the summit of Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1])/(fig.) awe-inspiring view from a very high place
to touch base matter and turn it to gold (idiom); fig. to turn crude writing into a literary gem
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
luan and phoenix/husband and wife/virtuous person/sovereign/belle
lit. opening a book is profitable (idiom); the benefits of education
